meanings.definition: The fifteenth letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the Greek alphabet, omicron comes after xi.
meanings.sent2: I learned about omicron while studying Greek letters.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly spelled her name using omicron as the 'o'.
meanings.sent4: The omicron on the page stood out among the other Greek letters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher drew a large omicron on the board to show the class.

meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the omicron variant of the virus.
meanings.sent2: The news reported a rise in cases due to omicron.
meanings.sent3: The omicron variant disrupted travel plans for many people.
meanings.sent4: People rushed to get vaccinated to protect against omicron.
meanings.sent5: The omicron variant spread quickly through the community.
